title: The Best of Patreon: August 2021
description:
Hey, y'all! If you aren't subscribed to our Patreon, we wanted to give you a glimpse of what we've got going on! This mega-mix of clips brings you some of our favorite segments from the month of August.
You'll hear a ruling from Judge Christie on a physical altercation at the happiest place on Earth, our advice to a listener on wedding planning for an absentee-future-sister-in-law, our guesses on what's in a mystery box that a worried wife found in her fridge, our reaction to unspeakable photos a woman found on her husband's phone, and a clip from our most recent minisode: the second part of our update on Britney Spears and her conservatorship battle.
If you like what you hear and want full versions of all this and more, head to patreon.com/sinisterhood for full details on all the benefits and subscribe today! 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices

content:encoded:
Hey, y'all! If you aren't subscribed to our Patreon, we wanted to give you a glimpse of what we've got going on! This mega-mix of clips brings you some of our favorite segments from the month of August.

You'll hear a ruling from Judge Christie on a physical altercation at the happiest place on Earth, our advice to a listener on wedding planning for an absentee-future-sister-in-law, our guesses on what's in a mystery box that a worried wife found in her fridge, our reaction to unspeakable photos a woman found on her husband's phone, and a clip from our most recent minisode: the second part of our update on Britney Spears and her conservatorship battle.

If you like what you hear and want full versions of all this and more, head to patreon.com/sinisterhood for full details on all the benefits and subscribe today! 

Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
